import React, { useRef, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const Header = () => { const headerRef = useRef(null); const menuRef = useRef(null); const [isMenuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [isSkillsOpen, setSkillsOpen] = useState(false); // Sticky Header Event Handler const handleScroll = () => { if ( document.body.scrollTop > 80 || document.documentElement.scrollTop > 80 ) { headerRef.current.classList.add('sticky_header'); } else { headerRef.current.classList.remove('sticky_header'); } }; useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => { window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }; }, []); const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const targetAttr = e.target.getAttribute('href'); const targetElement = document.querySelector(targetAttr); if (targetElement) { const location = targetElement.offsetTop; window.scrollTo({ top: location - 80, left: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; const toggleMenu = () => setMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); const toggleSkills = () => setSkillsOpen(!isSkillsOpen); return (
